name: Chaat Masala Steam Chicken Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chaat Masala Steam Chicken Recipe: Chicken Legs 4 Yogurt 1-1/2 cup Ingredients for Chaat Masala: Chili powder 1 tsp Black salt 1 tsp Salt ½ tsp Fennel seeds 1 tsp Cumin seeds 1-1/2 tbsp Coriander 1-1/2 tbsp Carom seeds 1 tsp Black pepper 1 tsp Tatric acid ¼ tsp
instructions: In a spice grinder, add all the ingredients of chaat masala and grind to a fine powder. In a bowl add chicken, yogurt and chaat masala, mix well and marinate for 2 to 3 hours. In a steamer place the chicken and cook on medium heat for 15 to 20 minutes and serve hot.
